americas_regional_organizations.purpose: To promote democracy, human rights, security, and development in the Western Hemisphere.

americas_regional_organizations.Objectives: Promoting harmonious and balanced socio-economic development in the region with the long-term goal of establishing a Latin-American single market.

americas_regional_organizations.purpose: To build a regional space for cultural, social, and economic integration.
To promote free trade and fluid movement of goods, people, and currency.

establishedBy.name: Andean Community of Nations
establishedBy.purpose: To promote development through integration and economic and social cooperation.

establishedBy.name: Forum for the Progress and Integration of South America
establishedBy.purpose: To ensure regional integration and development, focusing on infrastructure, energy, health, and security.

establishedBy.name: Caribbean Community
establishedBy.purpose: To promote economic integration and cooperation among its members.

establishedBy.name: Association of Caribbean States
establishedBy.members: 25 member states and 3 associate members from the Caribbean basin
establishedBy.purpose: To enhance regional cooperation and integration in trade, transport, sustainable tourism, and natural disasters.

establishedBy.name: Organisation of Eastern Caribbean States
establishedBy.purpose: To promote harmonization among member states in foreign policy, defense and security, and economic affairs.

establishedBy.name: Central American Parliament
establishedBy.purpose: To achieve political integration in Central America.

establishedBy.name: Bolivarian Alliance for the Americas
establishedBy.purpose: To implement policies of social welfare and mutual economic aid.

establishedBy.name: Rio Group
establishedBy.purpose: To provide a forum for Latin American nations to discuss and solve regional issues.

establishedBy.name: System of Cooperation Among the American Air Forces
establishedBy.purpose: To promote cooperation, friendship, and mutual understanding among the American air forces.

establishedBy.name: Central American Bank for Economic Integration
establishedBy.purpose: To promote economic integration and balanced economic and social development in the region.

establishedBy.name: Central American Integration System
establishedBy.purpose: To achieve regional integration in Central America.

establishedBy.name: Community of Latin American and Caribbean States
establishedBy.members: 33 countries in Latin America and the Caribbean
establishedBy.purpose: To deepen political, economic, social, and cultural integration in Latin America and the Caribbean.

establishedBy.name: Pacific Alliance
establishedBy.purpose: To form an area of deep economic integration and to move gradually toward the free mobility of goods, services, resources, and people.
